name: Grondy's Cabin
description:
CLICK THE GAME WINDOW IF SPACE DOESN'T WORK!

In Grondy's Cabin you are visiting your grandma for the weekend, helping out where you can.

... or you would be, however due to time constraints only the introduction is playable.

This is my entrant into the 2022 Cozy Autumn game jam, I hope you enjoy visiting Grondy's Cabin if only for a few minutes!

Keys -

A and D to move left and right

W or Space to Jump/double jump

S to drop through platforms
